page.title: 06Primary school equipment.
page.content: What does a small,four class primary school have in the way of equipment in 1985? We carried out a survey of electrical/electronic and musical equipment and this is what we found. (An asterisk{(*)}indicates equipment bought by the school using money donated by parents, etc.) {MUSICAL }ELECTRONIC {Piano }BBC computer{* {Recorders }Disc drive{* {Drums }Monitor{* {Tambourines }Stereo music system {Glockenspiels}Tape recorders {Shakers }Overhead projector {Cymbals }Television{* {Triangles }Video{* {Maracas }Thermal copier {Violins }Light copier {Wood block }Slide projector {Chime bars }Radio {Xylophones }Radio/recorders
